info.title: SystemLink Feed Service
info.description: Enables hosting a package repository within SystemLink

parameters.name: Platform
parameters.description: Returns only feeds with matching Platform field if this value is set

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.description: Returns only feeds with matching Workspace field if this value is set

parameters.name: feedId
parameters.description: The ID of the feed to query

parameters.name: feedId
parameters.description: The ID of the feed to delete.

parameters.name: feedId
parameters.description: The ID of the feed to update.

post.summary: Delete multiple feeds and their packages.

requestBody.description: A list of IDs of the feeds that are going to be deleted.

parameters.name: ignoreImportErrors
parameters.description: A query parameter that determines whether the service should abort the request if errors occur while importing some packages. If false, the service will abort and roll back the request if an error occurs while importing a package. If true, the service will import as many packages as it can, and return an error describing which packages could not be imported.

parameters.name: ignoreImportErrors
parameters.description: A query parameter that determines whether the service should abort the request if errors occur while importing some packages. If false, the service will abort and roll back the request if an error occurs while importing a package. If true, the service will import as many packages as it can, and return an error describing which packages could not be imported.

get.summary: Returns information about API versions and available operations.
Returns information and available operations for version 1 of the API.

applyUpdateDescriptors.description: Gets or sets an array of update descriptors.

packageUri.description: Package URL that is going to update.

platform.description: The platform of the feed, the following package extensions are available: .nipkg for windows feeds, .ipk and .deb for ni-linux-rt feeds.

workspace.description:
The ID of the workspace this feed belongs to.
If the workspace is not defined, the default workspace is used.

feedId.description: The id of the feed that is to be deleted.

jobId.description: The id of the job that will delete the feed.

ids.description: Collection of Feed Ids for the feeds that are going to be deleted

feeds.description: A collection of feeds containing feeds scheduled for deletion

packageIds.description: Package IDs to delete from the feed.

id.description: The auto-generated ID of the feed.

platform.description: The platform of the feed, the following package extensions are available: .nipkg for windows feeds, .ipk and .deb for ni-linux-rt feeds.

workspace.description: The ID of the workspace this feed belongs to.

updatedAt.description: The date of the latest feed update.

createdAt.description: The date when the feed was created at.

packageSources.description: The package sources list of the feed.

deleted.description: Whether the feed deletion was requested.

updateDescriptors.description: Gets or sets an array of update descriptors.

destinationFeedId.description: The ID of the feed which will be modified. This is used to reference the feed in the service.

GetUpdateDescriptorsResponse.description: Model for object containing an array of update descriptors.

message.example: The provided package ID does not exist or the user has no access to it.

resourceType.description: Type of resource associated with the error

resourceId.description: Identifier of the resource associated with the error

args.description: Positional argument values for the error code

innerErrors.description: Inner errors when the top-level error represents more than one error

example.name: Skyline.OneOrMoreErrorsOccurred
example.message: One or more errors occurred. See the contained list for details of each error.

innerErrors.name: feedservice.PackageNotFoundError
innerErrors.message: The provided package ID does not exist or the user has no access to it.

id.description: The auto-generated ID of the job.

resourceId.description: The ID of the resouce associated with the job.

workspace.description: The ID of the workspace this job belongs to.

updatedAt.description: The date of the latest job update.

createdAt.description: The date when the job was created at.

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created the job.

name.description: Name string from the ErrorCode class.

message.description: Error message which describes why the job failed.
message.example: Job failed: One or more errors occurred.

innerErrors.description: Internal errors that occurred in the service.

example.Name: InvalidPackageError
example.Message: The provided package 'package.nipkg' is invalid. Details: None

example.Name: IncompatiblePackageError
example.Message: The provided package 'package.deb' is incompatible with the feed's architecture.

JobIDResponse.description: The response used to return a Job ID.

resourceIds.description: The results associated with the job.

available.description: Whether the operation is available to the caller.

Operations.description: Available operations in the V1 version of the API.

id.description: Gets or sets the ID of this package. This is used to reference this package in the service.

fileName.description: The name of the file in this package.

feedId.description: The ID of the feed this package is associated with.

workspace.description:
The ID of the workspace this package belongs to.
The workspace of a package is the workspace of feed this package is associated with.

updatedAt.description: The date of the latest package update.

createdAt.description: The date when the package was created at.

version.description: The version number of the package.

breaks.description: Information about other packages this package breaks.

conflicts.description: Information about other packages this package conflicts with.

depends.description: Information about other packages this package depends on.

description.example: NI Curl provides the build of the "C URL" library

enhances.description: Information about other packages this package enchances.

essential.description: True if the package is essential.

fileName.description:
The file name of the package.
Depending on the selected platform, the following package extensions are available: .nipkg for windows feeds, .ipk and .deb for ni-linux-rt feeds.

homepage.description: The website of the maintainers for the package.

installedSize.description: The size of the package after install.

maintainer.description: The maintainer of the package (name and email address).

predepends.description: Information about other packages this package predepends.

provides.description: Information about other packages that this package provides.

recommends.description: Information about other packages this package recommends.

releaseNotes.description: The release notes of the package.

replaces.description: Information about other packages this package replaces.

section.description: The application area of the package.

size.description: The size (in bytes) of the package.

suggests.description: Information about other packages this package suggests.

platform.description: The platform of the feed, the following package extensions are available: .nipkg for windows feeds, .ipk and .deb for ni-linux-rt feeds.

workspace.description:
The ID of the workspace this feed belongs to.
If the workspace is not defined, the default workspace is used.

urls.description: Collection of Feed URLs that are going to be replicated

id.description: The auto-generated ID of the feed.

platform.description: The platform of the feed, the following package extensions are available: .nipkg for windows feeds, .ipk and .deb for ni-linux-rt feeds.

workspace.description: The ID of the workspace this feed belongs to.

updatedAt.description: The date of the latest feed update.

createdAt.description: The date when the feed was created at.

packageSources.description: The package sources list of the feed.

deleted.description: Whether the feed deletion was requested.

jobId.description: The auto-generated ID of the job used on the feed.

feeds.description: Collection of Feeds that are going to be replicated

version.description: The version number of the package after update.

packageUri.description: Package URL that is going to update.

workspace.description:
The ID of the workspace this feed belongs to.
If the workspace is not defined, the default workspace is used.

Version.description: Information about the v1 version of the API.

version.description: Implementation version of the web service.
